<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108658</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108658</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Invention Convention - Inventing and Marketing Products to Make Life Easier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfindung-Versammlung - Erfindung und 
Marketing-Produkte, um das Leben einfacher zu bilden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Convention d'invention - produits d'inventer et de
vente pour faciliter la vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Convenção da invenção - produtos inventar e de
marketing para fazer a vida mais fácil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Convenzione di invenzione - prodotti di vendita ed
inventare per rendere vita più facile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνθήκη εφευρέσεων - προϊόντα εφεύρεσης και 
μάρκετινγκ για να καταστήσει τη ζωή ευκολότερη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Convención de la invención - productos el 
inventar y de la comercialización para hacer vida más fácil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students work in groups to create products that can help address everyday annoyances. They then design business plans for the manufacturing and marketing of their inventions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion arbeiten Kursteilnehmer in den 
Gruppen, um Produkte herzustellen, die helfen können, tägliche 
Störungen zu adressieren. Sie konzipieren dann 
Unternehmenspläne für die Herstellung und das Marketing ihrer 
Erfindungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants travaillent dans
les groupes pour créer les produits qui peuvent aider à adresser des
ennuis journaliers. Ils conçoivent alors des plans d'affaires 
pour la fabrication et le marketing de leurs inventions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes trabalham nos grupos 
para criar os produtos que podem ajudar se dirigir a annoyances 
diários. Projetam então plantas de negócio para o 
manufacturing e o marketing de suas invenções.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi lavorano nei gruppi
per creare i prodotti che possono contribuire a richiamare i disturbi 
giornalieri. Allora progettano i programmi di affari per il 
manufacturing e l'introduzione sul mercato delle loro invenzioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές εργάζονται κατά 
ομάδες για να δημιουργήσουν τα προϊόντα που μπορούν να βοηθήσουν
να εξετάσουν τα καθημερινά annoyances. Σχεδιάζουν έπειτα 
τα επιχειρησιακά σχέδια για την κατασκευή και το μάρκετινγκ των 
εφευρέσεών τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes trabajan en 
grupos para crear los productos que pueden ayudar a tratar molestias 
diarias. Entonces diseñan los planes de negocio para la 
fabricación y la comercialización de sus invenciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
